verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, when he fled from Absalom his son.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> my adversaries <S%H6862><s%> have increased! <S%H7231><s%> Many <S%H7227><s%> are rising <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> me.
Many <S%H7227><s%> are saying <S%H559><s%> of my soul, <S%H5315><s%> "There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> for him in God. <S%H430><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> art a shield <S%H4043><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> me, My glory, <S%H9202><s%> and the One who lifts <S%H7311><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%>
I was crying <S%H7121><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with my voice, <S%H6963><s%> And He answered <S%H6030><s%> me from His holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I lay <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> and slept; <S%H3462><s%> I awoke, <S%H9516><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sustains <S%H5564><s%> me.

I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H7233><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me round <S%H5439><s%> about. <S%H5439><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me, O my God! <S%H430><s%> For Thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my enemies <S%H340><s%> on the cheek; <S%H3895><s%> Thou hast shattered <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongs to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Thy blessing <S%H1293><s%> [be] upon Thy people! <S%H5971><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
